name: Grasping Shadows
description:
Controls

Keyboard/mouse:

  • WASD to move, SPACE to jump
  • Aim your hook with the mouse and click+hold to throw hook (release if it's embedded in something to drag yourself there

Gamepad (e.g. XBox 360 controller):

  • Left-stick to move, A to jump
  • Aim with right-stick, left-bumper to throw hook (release if it's embedded in something to drag yourself)

The robots will put you back to sleep if you come into contact with them... Unless you contact them like REAL fast (hint hint).

This game is pretty incomplete, but this is as far as we got during the jam - it should be playable and get the general idea across!

All art and coding was done during the jam. We recorded some music and SFX but didn't get time to add them in, so please sing yourself a song whilst you play!
